subject: Re: Optivia website edits
preview: Hi Becci, Thanks for sending through the updates, confirming we have made the changes. We will wait for the final bits and pieces. Until then, have a great weekend.

full_threads.body:
Hi Becci, 

Thanks for sending through the updates, confirming we have made the changes. We will wait for the final bits and pieces. 

Until then, have a great weekend.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: @heath done for this updates , i update the status from open to complete under your name, please check spreadsheet and the site thanks

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body: @jaime can you please action the below as a priority. Cheers

Hi Heath,

I have gone through all the changes on the staging site, it's looking really good thank you!

QA doc <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KUhLQp5mFSaBSAge7Pi1R332PbC8rQVlSiWZPIQRXhc/edit?usp=gmail&gxids=7628#gid=0>

I made a couple of additional comments in the QA doc which I have marked in red and re-opened the status if they are against an existing item, or added a new line in and open status if they are brand new.

If you could take a look at this and amend that would be great!

I am going to share this with the client now as well so they can go through and make their comments and feedback in the same document column E and hope to have all their consolidated feedback through by mid to end of next week for actioning.

Thanks
Bec


Becci Drummond
HR & Business Operations Manager

On Wed, Feb 24, 2021 at 5:32 PM Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>> wrote:
Hi Becci,

Hope you are having a good week : )

Just a quick message to let you know we have made the updates for Optivia and also recorded the changes on the Google Sheet.

Please review and let me know what you think? I hope we have gotten the ‘pyramid’ looking graphics in the right places. If the client has the original illustrator (or similar) file, it would be great to get our hands on it. It will enable us to upload a vector version so it’s crisp.

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>

>> On 19 Feb 2021, at 10:00 am, Becci Drummond <becci@brandchemistry.com.au <mailto:becci@brandchemistry.com.au>> wrote:
>>
>> Hi Heath,
>>
>> Okay Optivia is finally ready to go with the next stage of website edits. Here is what I have for you:
>>
>> - Revised copy doc <https://docs.google.com/document/d/18YkU4Bydtfyq2IkNHisZ8MkSntfWpd8w/edit#> - this includes revisions to the copy and also some of the nav header names as well. To make this really clear I have drawn up a revised IA diagram in this doc too.
>>
>> We have meta descriptions and page url confirmations table in here too but I will tag you once that is complete and filled in.
>>
>> - QA document <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KUhLQp5mFSaBSAge7Pi1R332PbC8rQVlSiWZPIQRXhc/edit#gid=0>- I created this document to mirror the one used for Lavazza as that seemed to work really well as a collaborative document between us and also the client as well. I have not yet shared this with the client but I have gone through the current site and put feedback in each section as to where there are edits to copy, design, or layout. If you have any questions on this please let me know.
>>
>> Re the stock images selected - they have not been signed off by the client yet so can we use images with watermarks until they are signed off?
>>
>> Hopefully now the big meaty stuff of Lavazza is done we can get Optivia dusted off too! Can you let me know your timelines around putting in new copy in so I can book in time with the client?
>>
>> Thanks
>> Becci
